I have no idea where to start.  Since the following
code would not compile:
Pair p = (Pair) invoke(d, "mostFlexible", new Object[]
{ mcss });
Pair (the inner class) is not recognized in junitx
test.

> Leila wrote:
> 
> > Does anyone know if inner classes can be tested
> with

> returns
